comments:
Description:
NPE when drag parameter in cascading parameter group to Layout.(Only happen once).

Steps to reproduce:
1. I created a cascading parameter with country/state/city.
2. I drag city to Layout but got NPE, I cannot reproduce it again but something maybe wrong in codes, so I attached the NPE, maybe it can help.

Result:

*** Bug 133261 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Because #133261 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug, I attached steps here for ease of verification.

1. New a report from predefined template simple listing.
2. Click create data source button, then click cancell in data source dialog.
3. Click Layout.
Synch up with Callisto schedule to rename RC1 as RC2 targeted 5/5/2006.

I can't reproduce this problem.
Assume this fixed by other code changes.
Please reopen it if you still find this problem.
